00401 ReportStack::~ReportStack()

00403 
00404 void ReportStack::detailAccountsAllChanged(bool on)
00405 {
00406     if(on)
00407     {
00408         main.generalDetailAccountRangeBegin->setEnabled(false);
00409         main.generalDetailAccountRangeLabelBetween->setEnabled(false);
00410         main.generalDetailAccountRangeEnd->setEnabled(false);
00411         main.generalDetailAccountRangeAll->setFocus();
00412     }
00413     else
00414     {
00415         main.generalDetailAccountRangeBegin->setEnabled(true);
00416         main.generalDetailAccountRangeLabelBetween->setEnabled(true);
00417         main.generalDetailAccountRangeEnd->setEnabled(true);
00418     }
00419 } 
00420         
00421 void ReportStack::trialAccountsAllChanged(bool on)
00422 {
00423     if(on)
00424     {
00425         main.generalTrialAccountRangeBegin->setEnabled(false);
00426         main.generalTrialAccountRangeLabelBetween->setEnabled(false);
00427         main.generalTrialAccountRangeEnd->setEnabled(false);
00428         main.generalTrialAccountRangeAll->setFocus();
00429     }
00430     else
00431     {
00432         main.generalTrialAccountRangeBegin->setEnabled(true);
00433         main.generalTrialAccountRangeLabelBetween->setEnabled(true);
00434         main.generalTrialAccountRangeEnd->setEnabled(true);
00435     }
00436 }
00437 
00438 void ReportStack::dbOpened()
00439 {
00440     updateAccounts();
00441     
00442     QStringList periodBegin = db->getPeriodBegin();
00443     QStringList periodEnd = db->getPeriodEnd();
00444     main.generalDetailDateRangeBegin->clear();
00445     main.generalDetailDateRangeBegin->insertStringList(periodBegin);
00446     main.generalDetailDateRangeEnd->clear();
00447     main.generalDetailDateRangeEnd->insertStringList(periodEnd);
00448     main.generalTrialMonthEndList->clear();
00449     main.generalTrialMonthEndList->insertStringList(periodEnd);
00450     main.balanceMonthEndList->clear();
00451     main.balanceMonthEndList->insertStringList(periodEnd);
00452     main.incomeSvcMonthEndList->clear();
00453     main.incomeSvcMonthEndList->insertStringList(periodEnd);
00454     main.incomeRetailMonthEndList->clear();
00455     main.incomeRetailMonthEndList->insertStringList(periodEnd);
00456 
00457     raiseWidget(0);
00458     active = 0;
00459 }
00460 
00461 void ReportStack::updateAccounts()
00462 {
00463     accounts = db->getAccountsList();
00464     main.generalDetailAccountRangeBegin->updateAccounts(accounts);
00465     main.generalDetailAccountRangeEnd->updateAccounts(accounts);
00466     main.generalTrialAccountRangeBegin->updateAccounts(accounts);
00467     main.generalTrialAccountRangeEnd->updateAccounts(accounts);
00468 }
00469 
00470 void ReportStack::viewReport(QString &text)
00471 {
00472     report.view->setText(text);
00473 
00474     switchWidget();
00475 }
00476 
00477 void ReportStack::switchWidget()
00478 {
00479     if(active == 0)
00480     {
00481             raiseWidget(1);
00482             report.view->setFocus();
00483             active = 1;
00484     }
00485     else
00486     {
00487         raiseWidget(0);
00488         active = 0;
00489     }
00490 }
00491 
00492 void ReportStack::generalDetailReport()
00493 {
00494     if(main.generalDetailAccountRangeAll->isChecked())
00495         viewReport(db->getGeneralDetail(
00496                 main.generalDetailDateRangeBegin->currentText(),
00497                 main.generalDetailDateRangeEnd->currentText(),
00498                 "", "")->reportString());
00499     else
00500         viewReport(db->getGeneralDetail(
00501                 main.generalDetailDateRangeBegin->currentText(),
00502                 main.generalDetailDateRangeEnd->currentText(),
00503                 main.generalDetailAccountRangeBegin->accountNumber(),
00504                 main.generalDetailAccountRangeEnd->accountNumber())->reportString());
00505 }
00506 
00507 void ReportStack::generalTrialReport()
00508 {
00509     if(main.generalTrialAccountRangeAll->isChecked())
00510         viewReport(db->getGeneralTrialBalance(
00511             main.generalTrialMonthEndList->currentText(),
00512             "", "")->reportString());
00513     else
00514         viewReport(db->getGeneralTrialBalance(
00515             main.generalTrialMonthEndList->currentText(),
00516             main.generalTrialAccountRangeBegin->accountNumber(),
00517             main.generalTrialAccountRangeEnd->accountNumber())->reportString());
00518 }

00523 }
00524

00526 {

00528 }

00533 }
00534

00538 }

00540 void ReportStack::print()
00541 {
00542     printer->printReport(db->reportHeader(), db->reportData());
00543 }
00544 
00545 void ReportStack::exportPDF()
00546 {
00547     QString file = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(
00548             exportPath,
00549             "PDF Files (*.pdf)",
00550             this,
00551             0,
00552             "Export Report to PDF");
00553     
00554     if(file != "")
00555     {
00556         if(file.right(4) != ".pdf")
00557             file.append(".pdf");
00558 
00559         PDFOptions pdfOptions;
00560         QString options = pdfOptions.exec();
00561         if(options == QString::null)
00562             return;
00563 
00564         QFile tmpHTML(clientPath + "/tmp.html");
00565         if(!tmpHTML.open( IO_WriteOnly ))
00566             return;
00567 
00568         QTextStream tmpStream(&tmpHTML);
00569 
00570         QString html = db->reportHTML();
00571         html.replace("<tr><td> </td></tr>", "<tr><td>&nbsp;<br></td></tr>");
00572 
00573         tmpStream << html;
00574 
00575         tmpStream.unsetDevice();
00576         tmpHTML.close();
00577 
00578         system(QString(HTMLDOC_PATH + "/htmldoc --footer ./. --fontsize 9.0 "
00579                 + options +
00580                 "--right .5in --left .5in --top .2in "
00581                 "--textfont helvetica --no-toc --no-title --quiet -f \""
00582                 + file + "\" \"" + clientPath + "/tmp.html\""));
00583 
00584         remove(clientPath + "/tmp.html");
00585     }
00586 }
00587 
00588 void ReportStack::exportCSV()
00589 {
00590     QString file = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(
00591             importPath,
00592             "Comma Separated Values (*.csv)",
00593             this,
00594             0,
00595             "Export Report to CSV");
00596     
00597     if(file != "")
00598     {
00599         if(file.right(4) != ".csv")
00600             file.append(".csv");
00601 
00602         QFile destFile(file);
00603     
00604         if(destFile.open(IO_WriteOnly))
00605         {
00606             QTextStream destStream(&destFile);
00607             destStream << db->reportCSV();
00608         }
00609         destFile.close();
00610     }
00611 }

00613 void ReportStack::switchToEditBalance()
00614 {
00615     if(widget(2))
00616         delete balance.widget;
00617 
00618     balance.widget = new QWidget(this);
00619     balance.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(balance.widget);
00620     balance.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00621     balance.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00622     
00623     balance.labelLayout = new QHBoxLayout(balance.vBoxLayout);
00624     balance.topLabel = new GoBackLabel(balance.widget);
00625     connect(balance.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SLOT(switchWidget()));
00626     
00627     balance.labelLayout->addWidget(balance.topLabel);
00628     balance.labelLayout->addStretch();
00629     
00630     balance.editor = new BalanceSheetEditor(balance.widget);
00631     
00632     balance.vBoxLayout->addWidget(balance.editor);
00633     
00634     addWidget(balance.widget, 2);
00635 
00636     raiseWidget(2);
00637     active = 2;
00638 }
00639

00693 
00694 bool ReportStack::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00695 {
00696     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00697     {
00698         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent *)event;
00699         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_Escape)
00700         {
00701             if(active == 0)
00702                 emit goToMain();
00703             else
00704                 switchWidget();
00705             return true;
00706         }
00707         if((keyEvent->key() == Key_Enter || keyEvent->key() == Key_Return)
00708            && active == 0)
00709         {
00710             if(main.generalDetailButton->isDefault())
00711                 generalDetailReport();
00712             else if(main.generalTrialButton->isDefault())
00713                 generalTrialReport();
00714             else if(main.balanceReportButton->isDefault())
00715                 balanceReport();
00716             else if(main.incomeSvcModifyButton->isDefault())
00717                 switchToEditIncomeSvc();
00718             else if(main.incomeSvcButton->isDefault())
00719                 incomeSvcReport();
00720             else if(main.incomeRetailModifyButton->isDefault())
00721                 switchToEditIncomeRetail();
00722             else if(main.incomeRetailButton->isDefault())
00723                 incomeRetailReport();
00724             else if(main.chartAccountsButton->isDefault())
00725                 chartAccountsReport();
00726         }
00727         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8 && active == 1)
00728         {
00729             print();
00730             return true;
00731         }
00732         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F11 && active == 1)
00733         {
00734             exportPDF();
00735             return true;
00736         }
00737         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F12 && active == 1)
00738         {
00739             exportCSV();
00740             return true;
00741         }
00742     }
00743     if(event->type() == QEvent::FocusIn)
00744     {
00745         if(target == main.generalDetailDateRangeBegin
00746            || target == main.generalDetailDateRangeEnd
00747            || target == main.generalDetailAccountRangeBegin
00748            || target == main.generalDetailAccountRangeEnd
00749            || target == main.generalDetailAccountRangeAll
00750            || target == main.generalDetailButton)
00751         {
00752             if(!main.generalDetailButton->isDefault())
00753             {
00754                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(true);
00755                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00756                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00757                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00758                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00759                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00760                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00761                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00762             }
00763         }
00764         else if(target == main.generalTrialMonthEndList
00765                 || target == main.generalTrialAccountRangeBegin
00766                 || target == main.generalTrialAccountRangeEnd
00767                 || target == main.generalTrialAccountRangeAll
00768                 || target == main.generalTrialButton)
00769         {
00770             if(!main.generalTrialButton->isDefault())
00771             {
00772                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00773                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(true);
00774                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00775                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00776                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00777                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00778                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00779                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00780             }
00781         }
00782         else if(target == main.balanceMonthEndList
00783                 || target == main.balanceModifyButton   
00784                 || target == main.balanceReportButton)
00785         {
00786             if(!main.balanceReportButton->isDefault())
00787             {
00788                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00789                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00790                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(true);
00791                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00792                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00793                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00794                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00795                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00796             }
00797         }
00798         else if(target == main.incomeSvcMonthEndList
00799                 || target == main.incomeSvcButton)
00800         {
00801             if(!main.incomeSvcButton->isDefault())
00802             {
00803                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00804                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00805                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00806                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00807                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(true);
00808                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00809                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00810                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00811             }
00812         }
00813         else if(target == main.incomeSvcModifyButton)
00814         {
00815             if(!main.incomeSvcModifyButton->isDefault())
00816             {
00817                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00818                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00819                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00820                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(true);
00821                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00822                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00823                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00824                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00825             }
00826         }
00827         else if(target == main.incomeRetailMonthEndList
00828                 || target == main.incomeRetailButton)
00829         {
00830             if(!main.incomeRetailButton->isDefault())
00831             {
00832                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00833                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00834                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00835                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00836                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00837                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00838                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(true);
00839                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00840             }
00841         }
00842         else if(target == main.incomeRetailModifyButton)
00843         {
00844             if(!main.incomeRetailModifyButton->isDefault())
00845             {
00846                 main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00847                 main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00848                 main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00849                 main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00850                 main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00851                 main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(true);
00852                 main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00853                 main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(false);
00854             }
00855         }
00856         else if(target == main.chartAccountsButton)
00857         {
00858             main.generalDetailButton->setDefault(false);
00859             main.generalTrialButton->setDefault(false);
00860             main.balanceReportButton->setDefault(false);
00861             main.incomeSvcModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00862             main.incomeSvcButton->setDefault(false);
00863             main.incomeRetailModifyButton->setDefault(false);
00864             main.incomeRetailButton->setDefault(false);
00865             main.chartAccountsButton->setDefault(true);
00866         }
00867     }
00868     return QWidgetStack::eventFilter(target,event);
00869 }
